model.name: Unit-Web4Requirement Storage Integration Implementation
model.title: Unit-Web4Requirement Storage Integration Implementation
model.description: Implement integration between Unit UUID Index Storage and Web4Requirement latest version. Replace direct file operations with Unit storage calls, test with existing scenario 0338d554-5709-4264-9062-e92e77c1f93f, ensure backward compatibility via symbolic links, and validate unified storage with proper backlink tracking. Use semantic versioning v1.2.0 and full PDCA names in commit messages.
